data.text: Obiara a ɔpɛ ahohyɛso no pɛ nimdeɛ,
Nnipa pa nya Awurade nkyɛn adom,
Amumɔyɛsɛm rentumi mma onipa ase ntim,
Ɔyere a ɔwɔ suban pa yɛ ne kunu ahenkyɛw,
Atreneefo nhyehyɛe yɛ pɛ,
Amumɔyɛfo nsɛm da hɔ twɛn mogya,
Wotu amumɔyɛfo gu na wɔyera,
Wɔkamfo onipa sɛnea ne nyansa te
Eye sɛ wobɛyɛ wo ho sɛ ɔteta nanso wowɔ ɔsomfo,
Ɔtreneeni ma ne nyɛmmoa nea wɔpɛ,
Nea ɔyɛ nʼasase so adwuma no benya aduan bebree,
Amumɔyɛfo pɛ abɔnefo asade,
Ɔbɔnefo anosɛm yi no sɛ afiri,
Nneɛma pa fi onipa anom aba mu hyɛ no ma
Ɔkwasea akwan teɛ nʼani so,
Nkwaseafo bo nkyɛ fuw,
Ɔdanseni nokwafo di adanse turodoo,
Nsɛm hunu keka wowɔ te sɛ afoa
Ano a ɛka nokware no tim hɔ daa,
Nnaadaa hyɛ wɔn a wodwen bɔne ho no koma mu,
Ɔhaw biara rento ɔtreneeni,
Awurade kyi ano a etwa atoro,
Ɔtreneeni mmɔ ne nimdeɛ ho dawuru
Nsa a ɛyɛ adwuma no bedi tumi,
Koma a ɛpere ade ho ma onipa botow,
Ɔtreneeni wɔ ntoboase wɔ ayɔnkofa mu,
Onihawfo ntoto ne hanam,
Trenee kwan mu wɔ nkwa;
